casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Thomas WILKERSON. No. 170A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 16, 2008. Robert Montgomery, John H. Watters, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC. Thomas K. Maher, for Wilkerson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of April 2008 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of April 2008."
